meaning_str.bing:
adj. 盖满；盖着一层；有顶的
v. “cover”的过去式和过去分词
网络. 覆盖；隐蔽着的；覆盖的

有遮盖物的；（尤指）有顶的；有屋顶的
包括；覆盖；（cover的过去式和过去分词）

1.en: As I turned back around to see if I had cut off the kitchen light I saw the covered bird cage in the living room.
1.cn: 当我转过头去确认是否关上了厨房灯时，我看见了客厅里的那个盖着布的鸟笼。

2.en: The killers threw him into a ditch and covered his body with a thin layer of soil in an attempt to hide the body.
2.cn: 杀人者将他扔进一条壕沟内，然后在他的身上埋上了一层薄土，试图掩藏他的尸体。

3.en: Ravi covered his mouth with his hand and his eyes widened as the verdict was read in a courtroom in Middlesex County, New Jersey.
3.cn: 当其裁决在新泽西米德尔塞克斯县法庭宣判时，拉维用手捂住了嘴巴，眼睛瞪得很大。

0.en: The flood covered almost all of the Earth's crust.
0.cn: 洪水几乎覆盖了整个地壳。

1.en: If you missed your chance to get covered last year, here's the good news.
1.cn: 如果你失去了去年获得医保覆盖的机会，好消息来了。

2.en: Together, we can make sure that even more of America gets covered in the year ahead.
2.cn: 一起行动,我们可以确保更多的国人在明年获得医疗保险覆盖。

3.en: Here we are. The seaside. The beach is covered in snow. Oh. That sea looks cold.
3.cn: 我们到了！这就是海边！整个海滩被白雪覆盖了。噢！海水看起来很冷。

4.en: And this year insurance premiums for families who are covered through an employer grew at a rate tied for the lowest on record.
4.cn: 今年通过雇主获得医疗保险覆盖家庭的保险费用上涨速度是有史以来最低的。

5.en: Like at Shark Bay in Australia, they are made of billions of plankton skeletons, piled up in the geological era when the ocean covered the planet.
5.cn: 就像澳大利亚的鲨鱼湾，在海水覆盖地球的地质时代，大量浮游生物尸骨堆积成了这些岛。

6.en: The correct answer is when covered by a film of liquid sufficient to reduce the coefficient of static friction between the tire and the road to essentially zero, but not so deep as to introduce a new source of friction.
6.cn: 正确的答案是"当[路面]被覆盖上一层液体足以把轮胎和道路之间的静态摩擦系数减少到理论上的零值又不产生新的摩擦源"。

7.en: Every Thursday night for the last eight years, you and I and our friends have gathered here in this very spot to break bread covered with cheese and sauce, discuss the issues of the day, and yes, share a laugh or two.
7.cn: 在过去这八年的每个周四晚上，你和我还有我们的朋友们聚在这里，就在这里，切开覆盖着起司和酱料的面包[暗指披萨]，讨论当日话题，没错，还有分享欢乐。

8.en: I've got us covered. All the dos and don'ts.
8.cn: 我要让大家科普一下，该做的和不该做的事。

9.en: The cell membrane is covered with tiny projections.
9.cn: 细胞膜上有很多突出的部分。

10.en: Your face could be covered with lox, I wouldn't care.
10.cn: 就算长满熏鲑鱼我也不会在乎。

11.en: Why would I touch her? She's covered with airplane germs.
11.cn: 我干嘛碰她？她浑身布满了飞机细菌。

12.en: The Matthews and Hart Umbrella Foundation. We got you covered.
12.cn: 马修斯哈特雨伞基金会。我们为你遮风避雨。

13.en: You see this ground, it's covered in ice. A thousand years ago, it was covered in ice. A thousand years from now, it will still be ice.
13.cn: 看这块土地，被冰封住 1千年前它就被冰封住，再过1千年，它还是被冰封住。

14.en: And you got covered in its blood. As a matter of fact, I did.
14.cn: 你被它的血液喷到了。没错，被喷到了。

15.en: Mr. Polmar covered him with his body. Mr. Polmar? A.S.A. Polmar.
15.cn: 波尔马先生用身体掩护他。波尔马先生？助理检察官波尔马。

16.en: The hundreds of miles of road we've covered and the people we've met.
16.cn: 想到我们走过的数百里路，想到我们遇到的人。

17.en: Uh, I'm sorry. Should I keep going? No, no. Mr. Sullivan's covered it.
17.cn: 抱歉，我该继续吗？免了，苏利文先生包办了

18.en: Why did you even go to dinner with the guy? We covered this, I'm dumb.
18.cn: 你为什么要和他一起吃晚饭呢？我们才刚说过啊，我蠢呗。

19.en: You don't have to lie to me. You're covered by attorney-client privilege.
19.cn: 你不必对我说假话，你受律师与当事人保密特权保护。
